member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.HeadMethodPossibleIncorrectSpecification
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to "HEAD '{0}' method missing 404 status code section -- this might be unintentional..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.MissingProperties
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Azure resource {0} is missing required 'properties' property..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.ODataEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} needs to have a value..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.ODataFilterMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Method with {0} needs to have "$filter" parameter..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.ODataInvalidReferance
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} needs to have a valid definition reference..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.Properties.Resources.ResourcePropertyMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Schema definition for Resource type with x-ms-azure-resource extension should have following properties: {0}.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions
member.summary: Base code generator for Azure. Normalizes the ServiceClient according to Azure conventions and Swagger extensions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.HttpHeadStatusCodeSuccessFunc
member.summary: Defines the possible set of valid HTTP status codes for HEAD requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.NormalizeAzureClientModel(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient,Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Settings,Microsoft.Rest.Generator.CodeNamer)
member.summary: Normalizes client model using Azure-specific extensions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.SetDefaultResponses(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient)
member.summary: Set default response to CloudError if not defined explicitly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.ParseODataExtension(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient)
member.summary: Converts Azure Parameters to regular parameters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.IsAzureResource(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.CompositeType)
member.summary: Determines a composite type as an External Resource if it's name equals "Resource" and it has an extension named "x-ms-azure-resource" marked as true.
member.param: Type to determine if it is an external resource
member.returns: True if it is an external resource, false otherwise

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Azure.AzureExtensions.AddPageableMethod(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient,Microsoft.Rest.Generator.CodeNamer)
member.summary: Adds ListNext() method for each List method with x-ms-pageable extension.
